# Import Dataset Manually

```{r}
df = read.csv("input/simple_network.csv")
df
```

# Simple Visualization

```{r warning=FALSE}
# install.packages("igraph")
library(igraph)
```


```{r}
graph_object = graph_from_data_frame(df)
graph_object
```

```{r}
plot(graph_object)
```

# Selecting Layout

```{r}
layout <- layout.fruchterman.reingold(graph_object)
```


# Visualizations by properties

```{r}
plot(graph_object, 
     edge.arrow.size=.1, 
     vertex.color="blue", 
     vertex.size=15,
     vertex.frame.color="gray",  
     vertex.label.color="black", 
     vertex.label.cex=0.5, 
     vertex.label.dist=2, # change
     edge.curved=0,
     layout=layout) 
```
